attributes.action: Agree to the pay rise requests made by UK Coastguard staff to bring them in line with other Emergency Services
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: UK Coastguard are currently undertaking industrial action (while maintaining Emergency working coverage) to encourage Government to increase their poor pay levels (Barely Minimum Wage) and bring them in line with pay of other Emergency Services such as Ambulance and Police. UK Coastguard affects everyone who lives or visits our coast and we should all support them in their quest for a level playing field when it comes to pay rates

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Agree to the pay rise requests made by UK Coastguard staff to bring them in line with other Emergency Services."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here:
